metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26970 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: When reading SMTP server status codes, Thunderbird writes an integer value to a position on the stack that is intended to contain just one byte. Depending on processor architecture and stack layout, this leads to stack corruption that may be exploitable. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.5.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:78.5.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
